Constructor Detail

GAxis

public GAxis(PApplet parent,
             int type,
             float[] dim,
             float[] lim,
             boolean log)
GAxis constructor

Parameters:
parent - the parent Processing applet
type - the axis type. It can be X, Y, TOP or RIGHT
dim - the plot box dimensions in pixels
lim - the limits
log - the axis scale. True if it's logarithmic
